company: The Third Research Institute of MPC

details.description: Setting up Percona Master/Slave replication, wrote scripts that perform and manage database backups.
Performed database performance testing and tuning.
Implemented and tested server-side logic of token management module.
Misc: real time position tracking using Baidu Map API, and APNs-relavant API...
Developed RESTful APIs opened to third party developers.
Wrote corresponding Ajax code using jQuery.
Appended new security reports using Jasper Report.
